main.docTitle: Designation of Special Areas within Country Parks (Consolidation) Order

section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: This Order may be cited as the Designation of Special Areas within Country Parks (Consolidation) Order.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Designation of Government land as special areas
section.text: The areas of Government land within country parks specified in the Schedule are designated as special areas for the purposes of the Ordinance.

section.name: s1
section.content: Shing Mun Fung Shui Woodland Special Area

The area of Government land, situated within the Shing Mun Country Park, and known as the Shing Mun Fung Shui Woodland delineated and bounded in green and marked “2” on Plan No. CP/SM1A approved on 14 June 1977 by the Governor in Council and deposited in the office of the Country and Marine Parks Authority. (L.N. 204 of 1977)

section.name: s2
section.content: Tai Mo Shan Montane Scrub Forest Special Area

The area of Government land, situated within the Shing Mun Country Park, and known as the Tai Mo Shan Montane Scrub Forest delineated and bounded in green and marked “1” on Plan No. CP/SM1A approved on 14 June 1977 by the Governor in Council and deposited in the office of the Country and Marine Parks Authority. (L.N. 205 of 1977)

section.name: s3
section.content: Kat O Chau Special Area

The area of Government land within the Plover Cove (Extension) Country Park, comprising that part of Kat O Chau delineated in black and coloured pink on Plan No. SA/KOC dated 22 August 1979 and deposited in the office of the Country and Marine Parks Authority. (L.N. 239 of 1979)

section.name: s4
section.content: Pat Sin Range Special Area

That area of Government land within the Pat Sin Leng Country Park, comprising that part of Pat Sin Range delineated in black and coloured pink on Plan No. SA/PSR dated 19 December 1979 and deposited in the office of the Country and Marine Parks Authority. (L.N. 3 of 1980)

section.name: s5
section.content: Pak Tai To Yan Special Area

That area of Government land within the Lam Tsuen Country Park, comprising that part of Pak Tai To Yan delineated in black and coloured pink on Plan No. SA/PTTY dated 19 December 1979 and deposited in the office of the Country and Marine Parks Authority. (L.N. 3 of 1980)

section.name: s6
section.content: Lantau Peak Special Area

That area of Government land within the Lantau South Country Park, comprising that part of Lantau Peak delineated in black and coloured pink on Plan No. SA/LP dated 19 December 1979 and deposited in the office of the Country and Marine Parks Authority. (L.N. 3 of 1980)

section.name: s7
section.content: Sunset Peak Special Area

That area of Government land within the Lantau North and Lantau South Country Parks, comprising that part of Sunset Peak delineated in black and coloured pink on Plan No. SA/SP dated 19 December 1979 and deposited in the office of the Country and Marine Parks Authority. (L.N. 3 of 1980)

section.name: s8
section.content: Pok Fu Lam Special Area

That area of Government land within the Pok Fu Lam Country Park, comprising that part of Victoria Peak and Pok Fu Lam delineated in black and coloured pink on Plan No. SA/PFLA dated 26 February 1980 and deposited in the office of the Country and Marine Parks Authority. (L.N. 52 of 1980)

section.name: s9
section.content: Ma On Shan Special Area

That area of Government land within the Ma On Shan Country Park, comprising that part of Ma On Shan delineated in black and coloured pink on Plan No. SA/MOSB dated 26 February 1980 and deposited in the office of the Country and Marine Parks Authority. (L.N. 52 of 1980)

section.name: s10
section.content: Chiu Keng Tam Special Area

That area of Government land within the Plover Cove Country Park, comprising that part of Chiu Keng Tam delineated in black and coloured pink on Plan No. SA/CKT dated 26 February 1980 and deposited in the office of the Country and Marine Parks Authority. (L.N. 52 of 1980)

section.name: s11
section.content: Ng Tung Chai Special Area

That area of Government land within the Tai Mo Shan Country Park, comprising that part of Ng Tung Chai valley delineated in black and coloured pink on Plan No. SA/NTCA dated 26 February 1980 and deposited in the office of the Country and Marine Parks Authority. (L.N. 52 of 1980)
